name: Five-Minute Soup
keywords: appetizer, chicken broth, lean meat, vegetables, low calorie
recipeIngredient: Half a cucumber, scrubbed and sliced very thin but not peeled
2 cups shredded leafy green vegetables (spinach, lettuce or cabbage)
1/2 cup lean meat, cooked and shredded
Salt and pepper to taste as an ingredient

recipeInstructions.text: Heat broth. Add vegetables and meat. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes. Serve immediately.
